maqras.text: 2|158|Sai fa he mai er wei, que shi an la de biaozhi. Juxing da chao he xiao chao de ren, wufang you ci liang shan. Ziyuan xingshan zhe,(bidei shan bao), yin wei an la que shi hou bao de, que shi quanzhi de.
2|159|Wo zai jingdian zhong wei shiren chanmingzhengdao zhihou, yinhui wo suo jiang shi de ming zheng he zhengdao de ren, an la qi jue tamen; yiban zuzhou zhe, dou zuzhou tamen.
2|160|Wei huizui zi xin, chanming zhenli de ren, wo jiang she you tamen. Wo shi zhi you de, shi zhi ci de.
2|161|Zhongshen bu xindao, lin si hai bu xindao de ren, bi shou an la de qi jue, bi shou tianshi he renlei quanti de zuzhou.
2|162|Tamen jiang yong ju huo yu, bu meng jianxing, bu huo kuanxian.
2|163|Nimen suo dang chongbai de, shi weiyi de zhuzai; chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; ta shi zhiren de, shi zhi ci de.

2|164|Tiandi de chuangzao, zhouye de lunliu, li ren hanghai de chuanbo, an la cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, jie ta er shi yi si de dadi fusheng, bing zai da dishang sanbu ge zhong dongwu, yu fengxiang de gaibian, tiandi jian shouzhi de yun, duiyu neng liaojie de ren kan lai, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

2|165|Youxie ren, zai an la zhi wai, bie you chongbai, dangzuo an la de pidi; tamen jing'ai naxie pidi, xiang jing'ai an la yiyang——xindao de renmen, duiyu jing'ai an la, youwei ken zhi——dang bu yi de ren kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiaruo tamen zhidao yiqie nengli dou shi an la de, an la shi xingfa yanli de…….
2|166|Dangshi, bei suicong de ren, kanjian xingfa, er yu suicong de ren juejiao, tamen bici jian de guanxi dou duanjuele.

2|167|Suicong de ren, jiang shuo:“Dan yuan women de fan chenshi, name, women jiang yu tamen juejiao, youru tamen yu women juejiao yiyang.” An la jiang zheyang yi tamen de xingwei zhaoshi tamen, shi tamen gandao huihen, tamen jue buneng tao chu huo yu.
2|168|Zhongren a! Nimen keyi chi da dishang suoyou hefa erqie jiamei de shiwu, nimen buyao suicong emo de bufa, ta que shi nimen de ming di.
2|169|Ta zhi yi zui'e he choushi mingling nimen, bing jiao nimen jiajie an la de mingyi, er shuo chu nimen suo bu zhidao de shi.

2|170|Youren quan tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang zunshou an la suo jiang shi de jingdian.” Tamen jiu shuo:“Buran, women yao zunshou women zuxian de yijiao.” Jishi tamen de zuxian wuzhi wu shi, bu xun zhengdao (tamen reng yao zunshou tamen de yijiao ma?)
2|171|Bu xindao zhe piru (ni haozhao tamen) jiu xiang jiaohuan zhi hui ting huhan de shengchu yiyang.(Tamen) shi long de, shi ya de, shi xia de, gu tamen bu liaojie.
2|172|Xindao de renmen a! Nimen keyi chi wo suo gongji nimen de jiamei de shiwu, nimen dang ganxie an la, ruguo nimen zhi chongbai ta

2|173|ta zhi jinzhi nimen chi zi si wu, xieye, zhurou, yiji song fei an la zhi ming er zai de dongwu; fan wei shi suo po, fei chu ziyuan, qie buguo fen de ren,〔sui chi jinwu〕 hao wu zuiguo. Yin wei an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.

2|174|Yinhui an la suo jiang shi de jingdian, er yi lianjia chumai ta de ren, zhishi ba huo tun dao duzi li qu, zai fuhuo ri, an la ji bu he tamen shuohua, you bu dichu tamen de zui'e, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
2|175|Zhe deng ren, yi zhengdao huanqu mi wu, yi she you huanqu xingfa, tamen zhenneng renshou huoxing!
2|176|Zhe shi yin wei an la yi jiang shile baohan zhenli de jingdian, weibei jingdian de ren, que yi xianyu changyuan de fenlie zhi zhong.
